text: Write down the output of the given program (Show with a dry run table). [3] DECLARE SUB SHOW(A) CLS N = 87 CALL SHOW(N) END SUB SHOW (A). DO B = A MOD 6 + 3 IF B MOD 4 = 0 THEN GOTO AA PRINT B; AA: A = A - 10 LOOP WHILE A >= 50 END SUB
norm: write down the output of the given program (show with a dry run table). [3] declare sub show(a) cls n = 87 call show(n) end sub show (a). do b = a mod 6 + 3 if b mod 4 = 0 then goto aa print b; aa: a = a - 10 loop while a >= 50 end sub
